channel.title: [Help] All this Spyware/Adware found!
channel.description:
Hey everyone,
I just installed Spyware Doctor and ran all the tests and removed all the 153! Spyware/Adware that was found on my computer that other Spyware programs couldn't find.
I am just wondering, There is something which keeps taking my internet usage and I have no clue what it is but it sure was a trojan or something of the other... could anyone accurately take a look at the test results and pin-point what trojan did this or if there was any dangerous spyware/adware/trojans?
The Log file is attached. Please, if anyone could take a look at it :(
EDIT: This spyware: SearchIt is also found using another spyware cleaner, is this threat high?
Thanks, Surajd.

rofl 157 noob, i’ve had 2k before.

item.title: [Help] All this Spyware/Adware found!
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

philip_l_g:

they arent really that bad i suggest deleted yout internet files… go to Tools>internet options…>delete files>delete all offline content thats your cookies gone and also you might wanna get adaware and norton antivirus after you got this defrag your computer to do that start>all programs>accessories>System Tools and then disk defragment and also do a disk cleanup afterwards this will improve your computer proformance its not vital but it helpes alot after downloading things and installing things…(also norton antivirus is a good virus detector too…)you can also check all the infected files and delete them yourself if you need helpp deleting files e-mail: philip_l_g@hotmail.com you can add me on msn if you really want…

Defragging can be dangerous sometimes. If your computer crashes while doing defrag, the computer may not even boot up.

Read full topic

item.title: [Help] All this Spyware/Adware found!
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“Ron, post:8, topic:2564”][quote author=afi link=topic=2801.msg26627#msg26627 date=1147200812]
what happens if you delte the index.dat file isn’t the program that serachs the ways to find it ;)?
[/quote]
I wouldn’t delete it if I were you. I remember deleting it when I was little cause I thought it was fun to delete stuff and suddenly the computer couldn’t store cookies anymore. lol.

To delete cookies fast just download CCleaner. That is such a free and sweet program.

~Ron[/quote]

I love that program. I used to worship it a few years ago when I was on my moms computer and going through puberty Cough I was obbsessed with porn back thencough*lol

item.title: [Help] All this Spyware/Adware found!
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

Ad-Aware and Spy Doctor are on my list of free programs in 3rd Party Software. Also look at my computer virus thread for more information on how to clean up your computer and make it secure.

edit: Added Links
Free Programs
Viruses? Spyware? A Dirty Computer?

edit: Added which files were baaaaad.
These files are bad…
Backdoor.GrayBird.K HKLM\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Services\XPROTECTOR High
Backdoor.GrayBird.K HKLM\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Services\XPROTECTOR## High
Backdoor.GrayBird.K HKLM\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Services\XPROTECTOR##Type High
Backdoor.GrayBird.K HKLM\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Services\XPROTECTOR##Start High
Backdoor.GrayBird.K HKLM\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Services\XPROTECTOR##ErrorControl High
Backdoor.GrayBird.K HKLM\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Services\XPROTECTOR##ImagePath High
Backdoor.GrayBird.K HKLM\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Services\XPROTECTOR##DisplayName High
Backdoor.GrayBird.K HKLM\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Services\XPROTECTOR\Security High
Backdoor.GrayBird.K HKLM\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Services\XPROTECTOR\Security## High
Backdoor.GrayBird.K HKLM\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Services\XPROTECTOR\Security##Security High
Backdoor.GrayBird.K HKLM\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Services\XPROTECTOR\Enum High
Backdoor.GrayBird.K HKLM\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Services\XPROTECTOR\Enum## High
Backdoor.GrayBird.K HKLM\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Services\XPROTECTOR\Enum##0 High
Backdoor.GrayBird.K HKLM\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Services\XPROTECTOR\Enum##Count High
Backdoor.GrayBird.K HKLM\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Services\XPROTECTOR\Enum##NextInstance High
EliteBar C:\Documents and Settings\User.SUNIL-59A12B5BC\Local Settings\Temporary Internet Files\Content.IE5\WBITAZC9\rmtag3[2].js High
Dollarrevenue C:\Documents and Settings\User.SUNIL-59A12B5BC\Local Settings\Temporary Internet Files\Content.IE5\25XUJ2T8\ibar[1].js High
Keylogger.Cone.Trojan C:\WINDOWS\system32\bpk.bin Elevated
Trojan.Popuper C:\WINDOWS\system32\dcomcfg.exe High
Trojan.Popuper C:\WINDOWS\system32\hpAED4.tmp High
Trojan.Popuper C:\WINDOWS\system32\hpE471.tmp High
Keylogger.Cone.Trojan C:\WINDOWS\system32\rinst.dat Elevated
Backdoor.Bifrose.EF C:\DOCUMENTS AND SETTINGS\USER.SUNIL-59A12B5BC\DESKTOP\Suraj Main\FOLDERS\GB AIMBOTS\Aimbot Package + Howto\Aimbots\DragonBot wc v2.exe High
7AdPower HKCU\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Ext\Stats{A1426AC5-8CE5-4A00-B71E-011D35709AC6} High
7AdPower HKCU\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Ext\Stats{A1426AC5-8CE5-4A00-B71E-011D35709AC6}## High
7AdPower HKCU\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Ext\Stats{A1426AC5-8CE5-4A00-B71E-011D35709AC6}\iexplore High
7AdPower HKCU\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Ext\Stats{A1426AC5-8CE5-4A00-B71E-011D35709AC6}\iexplore## High
7AdPower HKCU\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Ext\Stats{A1426AC5-8CE5-4A00-B71E-011D35709AC6}\iexplore##Type High
7AdPower HKCU\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Ext\Stats{A1426AC5-8CE5-4A00-B71E-011D35709AC6}\iexplore##Count High
7AdPower HKCU\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Ext\Stats{A1426AC5-8CE5-4A00-B71E-011D35709AC6}\iexplore##Time High
7AdPower HKCU\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Ext\Stats{A1426AC5-8CE5-4A00-B71E-011D35709AC6}\iexplore##Blocked High

Looks like you downloaded a GunBound Autoer. Bad idea man. All hacks. Go in there and delete those files and registry entries. Don’t go on porno websites man, they are BAD news.

Delete all your cookies in C:\Documents and Settings\User.SUNIL-59A12B5BC, but DO NOT delete that index.dat file.

~Ron

Read full topic

Well, you have a ton of cookies. And the “netpumper” was most likely doing it. And you have several system pop-ups which could be contributing.

item.title: [Help] All this Spyware/Adware found!
item.dc:creator: @Tree Tree
item.description:
@Tree wrote:

Adware has a constant connection to the internet which it then uses to load other advertisements.

Also please take note that free anti-virus software contains viruses so they can detect it then you think “oh this is great,ill go out and buy the premium one”.

Read full topic
